title: Prototype 2: RADNET Edition + 2 DLCs
body:
Prototype 2: RADNET Edition + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Radical Entertainment, Activision
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 14.4 GB
Repack Size: from 5.9 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi7
  • RuTor [magnet] MULTi4
  • Tapochek.net MULTi4
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi7
  • Filehoster: Google Drive + 4 hosters (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Prototype.2.MULTi7-PROPHET ISO release: ppt-pte2.iso (15,415,150,592 bytes)
  • PROPHET crack replaced with LumaEmu (the only crack, which properly unlocks RADNET Edition bonuses and doesn’t mark them complete with Gold result, thanks to Steam006!); Other cracks are available for collectors in NoDVD folder after installation
  • 2 console DLCs: Excessive Force & Colossal Mayhem are unlocked with a special unlocker, properly modified for all seven languages
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of bonus videos from RADNET Access Pack and language packs you don’t need (English, German and Polish support is included by default)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 14.4 to 5.9~7.3 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 7-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 12 GB (up to 14 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The sequel to Radical Entertainment’s best-selling open-world action game of 2009, Prototype® 2 takes the unsurpassed carnage of the original Prototype and continues the experience of becoming the ultimate shape-shifting weapon. You are Sgt James Heller, husband to a deceased wife and child and a soldier left simply to die.

As the game’s all-new infected protagonist, players will experience Sgt James Heller cutting a bloody swathe through the wastelands of post-viral New York Zero. Equipped with unparalleled new shapeshifting powers,players will gradually build a vast genetic arsenal of deadly new biological weapons and abilities as they hunt, kill and consume their way toward the ultimate goal – to kill…Alex…Mercer!

Are you ready to murder your maker?

You can skip downloading of bonus videos & language packs you don’t need. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-videos.bin (bonus videos, unlocked in RADNET menu during playthrough)
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-russian.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with French UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-optional-french.bin & all main files (01-10)
